title: CDK Configuration
description: Schema for cdk.json configuration files used by the AWS CDK CLI

app.description: The command that executes the CDK application

build.description: The command that compiles or builds the CDK application before synthesis (not permitted in ~/.cdk.json)

language.description: The language to be used for initializing new projects

output.description: The name of the directory into which the synthesized cloud assembly will be emitted

outputsFile.description: The file to which AWS CloudFormation outputs from deployed stacks will be written (in JSON format)

profile.description: Name of the default AWS profile used for specifying Region and account credentials

toolkitStackName.description: The name of the bootstrap stack

toolkitBucketName.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket used for deploying assets such as Lambda functions and container images

bootstrapKmsKeyId.description: Overrides the ID of the AWS KMS key used to encrypt the Amazon S3 deployment bucket

requireApproval.description: Default approval level for security changes

assetMetadata.description: If false, CDK does not add metadata to resources that use assets

pathMetadata.description: If false, CDK path metadata is not added to synthesized templates

notices.description: If false, suppresses the display of messages about security vulnerabilities, regressions, and unsupported versions

versionReporting.description: If false, opts out of version reporting

debug.description: If true, CDK CLI emits more detailed information useful for debugging

staging.description: If false, assets are not copied to the output directory

lookups.description: If false, no context lookups are permitted

rollback.description: If false, failed deployments are not rolled back

progress.description: If set to 'events', the CDK CLI displays all AWS CloudFormation events during deployment, rather than a progress bar

browser.description: The command for launching a Web browser for the cdk docs subcommand

context.description: Context values and feature flags (values in configuration file will not be erased by cdk context --clear)

plugin.description: JSON array specifying the package names or local paths of packages that extend the CDK

tags.description: JSON array containing tags (key-value pairs) for the stack

include.description: Files or directories that should trigger a rebuild when changed

exclude.description: Files or directories that should not trigger a rebuild when changed

watch.description: Configuration for watch mode file monitoring

proxy.description: Proxy server URL for HTTP requests

caBundlePath.description: Path to CA certificate bundle for HTTPS requests

assetPrebuild.description: Whether to prebuild all assets before deployment

ignoreNoStacks.description: Whether to ignore the error when no stacks are selected

minimumHealthyPercent.description: Minimum healthy percent for ECS hotswap deployments

maximumHealthyPercent.description: Maximum healthy percent for ECS hotswap deployments

stabilizationTimeoutSeconds.description: Stabilization timeout in seconds for ECS hotswap deployments

unstable.description: List of unstable features to enable

custom.description: Area for user-defined custom properties that won't trigger validation warnings
